tool_description: Creates optimized purchase orders by analyzing inventory needs, supplier options, pricing, and delivery schedules.

required_items.description: List of items needed for purchase

budget_limit.description: Maximum total budget for this order

consolidation_preference.description: Prefer fewer suppliers even if slightly more expensive

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: required_items and required_quantities arrays must have the same length.
Invalid delivery date: delivery_date must be in the future and in valid ISO 8601 format.
Budget constraint impossible: The minimum cost to fulfill requirements exceeds budget_limit. Increase budget or reduce quantities.
No suppliers available: No suppliers meet the quality_minimum rating for the required items.
Invalid quantity: All quantities in required_quantities must be positive numbers.
Insufficient supplier capacity: Available suppliers cannot fulfill the total order volume by the delivery date.
usage: Provide lists of required items and quantities, specify delivery date, and optionally set budget constraints and supplier preferences. The tool will generate optimized purchase orders across selected suppliers.

total_order_value.description: Total cost of all generated orders

order_items.description: Items allocated to each supplier order

order_quantities.description: Quantities for each item in supplier orders

estimated_savings.description: Cost savings compared to single-supplier ordering

delivery_schedule.description: Expected delivery dates for each supplier order
